title: Define the project scope and requirements
description: Outline what the assistantSantéIA should do, its features, functionalities, and limitations.

title: Design the architecture for assistantSantéIA
description: Plan the structure and components of the system, considering frontend, backend, database, and APIs.
dependencies: Define the project scope and requirements

title: Develop the frontend of assistantSantéIA
description: Create the user interface, including forms for inputting user data, displaying personalized health advice, and handling real-time analytics.

title: Develop the backend of assistantSantéIA
description: Implement the business logic for analyzing user health data, generating personalized advice, and integrating real-time analytics.

title: Create the database schema for assistantSantéIA
description: Design and implement the structure of the database, including tables, relationships, indexes, and constraints.

title: Set up devops and deploy assistantSantéIA
description: Configure continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and deployment strategies.
dependencies: Create the database schema for assistantSantéIA

title: Perform quality assurance testing on assistantSantéIA
description: Validate that the system functions correctly, has proper user interfaces, and meets all requirements.

title: Address security concerns in assistantSantéIA
description: Ensure that the system follows best practices for data privacy, encryption, and user authentication.

title: Document the development process and user manual for assistantSantéIA
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation (including APIs, architecture diagrams, coding standards, and user guides). Ensure the documentation is easily accessible, well-organized, and includes a section on data privacy and security considerations. Collaborate with the assigned team members to ensure accuracy and completeness.
